entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.4°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 before morning. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
